visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year. Custom colors should be applied to the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart to display monthly average temperatures with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and custom colors are applied to the series. The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes for better readability. The chart includes additional configurations such as margins, background color, and legend settings to enhance the overall appearance and usability of the chart. The data series represents the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature' and data points corresponding to each month.
